Plot: Eleven tales of love connected by padlocks on a gate - a journey exploring the heart behind the worldwide phenomenon that is Locks of Love.
Title: Locks of Love
Writer: Evan Croker, Bruce Davie, Christian Doran, Rebecca Filipczyk, Luke Hendrickson, Kris Kerehona (story), Daniel Lloyd, Tony Marziano, Adele Morey, Adrian Muscat, Micael Ortiz, Ben Wade, Megan Watson
Director: Jane Barrett, Evan Croker, Bruce Davie, Christian Doran, Morgan Gardiner, Luke Hendrickson, Kris Kerehona, Daniel Lloyd, Marisa Martin, Adele Morey, Micael Ortiz, Julia Topal Silva, Ben Wade, Megan Watson, Jim Wilks
Actors: Stephen Baker, Stephen Barker, Oliver Baudert, Talia Baussmann
